title: kaDaikkaN pArvai
sahitya:
kaDalil amizhndiDuvOm karuNaik-kaDal kaDavuL aDi paNindu taDanguDanaik-


anupallavi

  uDal paDaittOmE vAnamil mAniDa uDalini varumO perum Anadak-


caraNam    pApa puNyam arindu nannerishella paghuttarivaLitta paramanE patita
 pAvananE bhuvanapatiyE emru pADiyADi onru kUDi brahmAnadak-
